text: Kåre Dæhlen (born 23 October 1926) is a Norwegian diplomat. He started working for the Norwegian Ministry of Foreign Affairs in 1955. He served as the Norwegian ambassador to Greece (1974–1976), Poland (1981–1986), India (1986–1990) and Austria (1990–1994). ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of Norway
title: Kåre Dæhlen
